projects.name: LPK Kalleria
projects.desc: LPK Kalleria is a course institution. I design and develop registration, transaction, attendance, and certification systems. I work with Nuxt JS, Tailwind, Express and Postgre.

projects.name: Quran Digital
projects.desc: Quran Digital is a client request project built with native JS (Including SPA), using the Webpack bundler. Features: surah viewer, verse autoplay audio player, and interpretation.

projects.name: E-Surat
projects.desc: E-Surat is a web-based archive for office letters. This is a full stack project that I built using HapiJS & Postgre (Back-End) and Vue JS & Tailwind (Front-End). (Back-End server is currently offline)

projects.name: Forum API
projects.desc: This project was built using HapiJS, Postgre, and JWTAuth strategy. I implemented the Clean Architecture architectural pattern. This project is my final project of the "Becoming a Back-End Developer Expert" course at Dicoding Indonesia.

projects.name: Websdeck
projects.desc: This project was built using Vue JS. Websdeck is a CSS-JS Playground that was inspired by CSSDeck.

projects.name: Banking Web
projects.desc: This project was built using Vue JS, which is also my first project using Vue Js. I got the UI design for this project from uidesign.to.

projects.name: dDesign Web
projects.desc: This project was built with Vanilla JS. This website is a gallery that displays my friend's works.

projects.name: Bookshelf
projects.desc: This project was built with Vanilla JS. This project is a submission project for the Beginner Level Web Front-End class at Dicoding. With this project I graduated to intermediate level.

projects.name: Todays Meals Web
projects.desc: This project was built using Web Components. This project is a submission project for the Intermediate Level Web Front-End class at Dicoding, and with this project I graduated to the expert level.

projects.name: Node JS Authentication API
projects.desc: This project is a simple Back-End project to create an authentication on the web.

projects.name: Multer x Sharp
projects.desc: This project was built with a combination of Multer and Sharp which aims to resize the original image input from the client side and store it on the server.
